products.name: TAILORED COTTON COAT
products.description: An understated style, this tailored coat is made from crisp cotton with a partial lining. Fastened with a hidden zip and push button, it has notched lapels, discreet side pockets and clean edges.

products.name: LONG-SLEEVE TOP WITH CURVED HEM
products.description: This striped top is made from soft pima cotton with a soft-brush jersey quality and an all-over pattern. A straight, slip-on fit, it is completed with a curved hemline and a solid round neck in a contrasting colour.

products.name: COLOUR-BLOCK CARDIGAN
products.description: This cardigan is made from a stretch-cotton blend knit with colour-blocking design details. A cropped, gently waisted fit, it has tactile towelling features at the front and wide ribbed trims.

products.name: TAILORED WOOL CULOTTES
products.description: A culotte style, these trousers are made from a tailored wool blend. Designed for a wide-leg fit in an ankle length, they have slanted pockets, a hidden zip fly fastening and sharp press folds.

products.name: LONG SHIRT DRESS
products.description: Made from crisp cotton, this striped shirt dress has a simple fabric belt designed to be tied at the waist. A straight fit, it has a pointed collar, long cuffed sleeves and a rounded hemline with subtle side slits.

products.name: COTTON-LINEN KNIT PENCIL SKIRT
products.description: This knitted skirt is made from a chunky cotton and linen blend with a textured quality. Cut for a close fit, it is completed with a grosgrain elastic at the waistband, softly rolled edges and minimal stitching.

products.name: JERSEY DRESS WITH DRAPE
products.description: This dress is made from cotton jersey with gentle stretch. Designed for a straight fit, it has a wide neckline, front draping and short, wide sleeves.

products.name: JERSEY DRESS WITH DRAPE
products.description: This dress is made from cotton jersey with gentle stretch. Designed for a straight fit, it has a wide neckline, front draping and short, wide sleeves.

products.name: JERSEY DRESS WITH DRAPE
